Only Daughter Lollia:
You want know about the tavern?
The Mystic Tavern is our family's dream come true. We started it in order to have a place where travelers from all around the world can come to listen to the great stories that everyone has. I was worried, since Underground Gainak is not widely known, but my dad's friends spread the word for us.
Currently, we only have stories about Kelbim, Tauti, and Freya, but we will try expand later on.
